title: Behind the Scenes
overview: Aimed at 8 to 12-year-olds, the series combines equal parts of irreverence and insight. Each program features artists at work â€“ including Hockney, Taymor, Roach, Alan Toussaint and many others. Aided by computer graphics, animation and Penn and Teller's tricks, the series lets kids in on the marvelous magic of art.
